name: Gang wars
body:
## Introduction

**Gang wars** is a text-based game where 2 gangs from the opposite side of the city (East side and West side) are fighting each other to rule the city.
At the beginning of the game, you will have to choose which gang you will join. After that, you will start at your gang side territory and you will have to move through the maps where you can find useful objects (weapons, medical objectsâ€¦) and friendly gang members that can help you or enemies that will try to kill you.

## Original Zork

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=64-VQjygTGc>

##Game Map

![](http://i67.tinypic.com/2884e8j.jpg)

##Documentation

The [Wiki](https://github.com/TinoTano/Gang_Wars/wiki) contains all the information you'll need.

##Reporting Issues

Use the [issue tracker](https://github.com/TinoTano/Gang_Wars/issues) here on GitHub to report issues.

## Play the game!

[Release Page](https://github.com/TinoTano/Gang_Wars/releases) (Game under development)
